T02D3344:31b-1: au di y'a na m'a r'i tsyee s'a dha nam /
T02D3344:31b-3: audyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3344:31b-4: 'phags ma 'od zer can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3344:31b-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa'i rjes su stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3344:31b-6: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la mam gi sa
T02D3344:31b-7: bon dmar po yongs su gyur pa las au dyan
T02D3344:31b-8: gyi 'od zer can mdog dmar ba /
T02D3344:31b-9: zhal drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum mo //
T02D3344:32a-3: ser po ni g-yas skor du zhal lnga'o //
T02D3344:32a-4: steng du ni phag zhal nag po'o //
T02D3344:32a-5: dang po g-yas kyi phyag drug tu go rims bzhin du ral gri dang /
T02D3344:32a-11: g-yon gyi phyag rnams su sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3344:32a-14: mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang /
T02D3344:32a-17: mchod rten gyi nang na gnas pa /
T02D3344:32a-18: klu'i dbang po brgyad kyis sku brgyan pa /
T02D3344:32a-19: skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba /
T02D3344:32a-21: mgo bo skam po brgyad kyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3344:32a-22: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba ske ba nas 'chang ba /
T02D3344:32a-23: rin po che mang pos spras pa'i shing rta sna tshogs pa phag pa bdun la chibs pa /
T02D3344:32a-24: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3344:32a-25: shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa ni skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3344:32a-29: mdog bzang po'i 'od zer can sha 'gag ser po /
T02D3344:32a-30: sna tshogs kyi rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02D3344:32a-31: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs kyis kyang brgyan pa'o //
T02D3344:32a-32: 'od dmar po las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang /
T02D3344:32a-33: skad cig gis bsams la snying gar nyi ma la
T02D3344:32a-34: mam gi sa bon las rnam par byung ba'i 'od
T02D3344:32a-35: zer brgyad / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bkug ste /
T02D3344:32a-36: dbang bskur ba blangs nas rnam par snang mdzad bdag
T02D3344:32a-37: nyid kyi dbu rgyan du rnam par bsam par bya'o
T02D3344:32a-38: // de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rim pa 'dis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3344:32a-39: aom m'a r'i tsyee m'am h'um h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
T02D3344:32a-40: bzlas pa byas nas phyis kyi dus su ting nge
T02D3344:32a-41: 'dzin nye bar bsdus la de nyid kyi rnal 'byor
T02D3344:32a-42: gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02D3344:32a-43: au dyan gyi 'od zer can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3344:32a-44: slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3344:32a-45: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
